text: Savory Tomato Scrambled Eggs Beat the eggs with the yogurt. Add the pepper and diced tomatoes and mix through. Add the butter to a frying pan. Heat to melt it, using low heat. Pour in the scrambled egg mixture. Cook slowly over low heat, stirring now and then. Cook until the scrambling is of the consistency you like.  Remove from the heat. Transfer to the serving plates in even portions. Garnish with a little salt and pepper  Serve warm.  Tomato, Basil and Cheese Scrambled Eggs Cut the tomato into diced portions or small wedges.  Cook the tomato in the butter for a minute.  In a bowl, crack the eggs in. Add the Parmesan cheese and the cream. Stir to combine. Pour the egg mixture into the buttered tomatoes. Cook slowly over low heat, stirring now and then to scramble. Remove from the heat. Transfer to the serving plate. Garnish with the cherry tomato halves and torn basil leaves. Serve immediately. A little extra Parmesan can be added, if desired. Finished.
